text: allah obava valakvanne, dharma karanavanhi oba samaga yuddha kala aya samagada, obage nivesvalin obava pitamam kala aya samagada, obava pitamam kirimehi (saturanta) udav kala aya samagada, oba mituran vasayen nositiya yutuya yanuveni. ebÃ¦vin kavurun ovun samaga mituru sabandakam pavatvannoda, ovun aparadhakarayinya
